arts.ttl: Real Madrid possible starting lineup today against Real Oviedo in LaLiga
arts.sum: Real Madrid travel to Oviedo (Sunday at 3:30 p.m. ET / 12:30 p.m. PT) aiming for their second league win of the season, but the week has revolved around one lingering question: Who will start on the right wing in Xabi Alonso’s setup? As Alonso reminded reporters, “All the decisions regarding the game and the starting eleven are solely mine.

arts.ttl: Mbappé scores twice as Real Madrid wins 3-0 at Oviedo to maintain perfect start in La Liga
arts.sum: Real Madrid coach Xabi Alonso started with Vinícius Júnior on the bench for the Spanish league game at Oviedo on Sunday but the Brazil star still played a decisive role after coming on in the second half, creating one goal and scoring another in a 3-0 win for Madrid. Osasuna beat Valencia 1-0, and Real Sociedad came from two goals down to share the points at home with Espanyol in a 2-2 draw.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Player Ratings: Mbappe fires as Rodrygo returns at Oviedo
arts.sum: Real Madrid stepped up after the break to secure a 3-0 La Liga win away at Real Oviedo to make it back-to-back victories so far this season. Real Madrid Player Ratings: Thibaut Courtois – 8 Did not have a lot to do in the first half but made two crucial saves late on, either side […] The post Real Madrid Player Ratings: Mbappe fires as Rodrygo returns at Oviedo appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Rotation Works Out for Xabi Alonso: Three Takeaways From Real Madrid’s Eventual 3–0 Win Over Real Oviedo
arts.sum: Real Madrid still have room to improve after a very short summer break.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 3-0 Real Oviedo (24 de Ago., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Real Oviedo 0-3 Real Madrid: Report & Full Match Highlights With Kylian Mbappé at the Double
arts.sum: Inside the first 15 minutes of the second half, Real Madrid's intensity dropped significantly, allowing the hosts to be more dominant on the ball while creating several half-chances, pushing Xabi Alonso to operate a double substitution with Vini Jr. and Brahim Diaz coming onto the pitch while Rodrygo and Mastantuono were subbed off. Real Oviedo had the best first-half chance of the game thanks to a clever long ball on kick-off; nonetheless, Xabi Alonso's side controlled the first stages of the game and reacted quickly through Rodrygo, who saw his deflected effort go just wide of Aarón Escandell's post.

arts.ttl: European football: Mbappé and Vinícius fire Real Madrid past Oviedo
arts.sum: La Liga newcomers beaten 3-0 at home David and Vlahovic give Juventus victory Real Madrid claimed a 3-0 La Liga win at promoted Real Oviedo on Sunday, with Kylian Mbappé scoring in each half before Vinícius Júnior added a late third to seal the match. Mbappé put Real ahead in the 37th minute after Aurélien Tchouaméni won the ball off Leander Dendoncker in midfield and quickly fed Arda Guler. He slipped a pass to the Frenchman who turned sharply on the edge of the box and drilled a low shot into the net. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Player Ratings vs. Real Oviedo: Clinical Kylian Mbappe Strikes Twice in 3–0 Win
arts.sum: Los Blancos have won back-to-back La Liga games under Xabi Alonso without hitting top gear.

arts.ttl: ‘I Will Always Be Grateful’—How Real Madrid Helped Save Real Oviedo From Extinction
arts.sum: Real Oviedo are back in La Liga this season, but almost ceased to exist 13 years ago.

arts.ttl: Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid: Confirmed Starting Lineup Announced for La Liga Match
arts.sum: In the victory, Xabi Alonso gave their Real Madrid debut to Álvaro Carreras and Franco Mastantuono while summer transfers Trent Alexander-Arnold and Dean Huijsen played their first game at the Santiago Bernabéu with the club. For this game against newly promoted side Real Oviedo, Xabi Alonso operated to four changes to his starting XI from the Osasuna victory, giving his first start to Franco Mastantuono, while club Captain Dani Carvajal earns his first start since coming back from injury.
